Text: Let's do it.

My last idea, Plan C. In order to carry it out,
I'm heading to...
Hey, I came back for seconds.

With an arrogant attitude, I approach the senior
Bushin class students. I haven't been here since
Alexia dragged me along.
You're...Cid Kagenou! You break up with the princess...?

Looks like the class president has her eyes on you...
Good for you, eh?!
I can feel them stabbing me with their eyes.
(Good...give me more! Drown me in your hatred!)

Heh, I'd like to show you that I'm not the same as I
was the last time...

But I'm nothing more than an extra, drunk on his
cringe-worthy fantasy which has unexpectedly
come true.

These guys are perfect for knocking me down a peg or
two about being the "chosen one!"

Okay, who wants to go first? I'd rather take you all
out at once, though.
This idiot...! Everyone, let's get him!
Yeahhh!

He's the class president's favorite, let's rough
him up!
(Whoa, they're surrounding me.)

(Gotta love it, I can use my NPC Technique on them
if they're in a group. Just don't want to overdo it
this time...!)
Hyaaah!
Agh...!

I take a hit head-on, and throw myself backwards
diagonally.
Aagh!

I bump into the fatty behind me and bounce off to
the side, where I fall towards the skinny one with
my neck out.
Hah!
Aaaah!

Something hit the back of my head and I kissed
the ground. This triangular locus is one of my NPC
Techniques, "Triangular Danse Macabre!"

Heh, why are you so full of yourself?
You're super weak!

Someone's boot digs into my side as I lay on
the ground.
Ah! Agh...!

I curl up and simply take it. This is one of my NPC
Techniques—the pill bug's last stand. "Roly Poly
Dead End!"

The good thing about this technique is its impact.
It's absolutely miserable, the pinnacle of
humiliation!
Not gonna fight back?!

What a weakling! That time with the terrorist
must've been a one-hit wonder!

You just took that hit as you were runnin' away
I bet! Hahaha!

Yes! That's what I want to hear! I supress my smile
as I roll on the ground.

(I knew they'd say what I wanted to hear. I'll fake
losing conciousness and get hauled to the
medical ten—)
What are you doing?!

Suddenly, a diginfied voice reverberates over the
training ground. This voice is...!
Th-The class president...!
W-We're only practicing...!
The boot is removed from my side and I raise my face.

What on earth kind of practice involves multiple
people against one?!

Looking up, I can see that Rose is pissed. I picked
a time I thought she wouldn't be around, but I
was wrong.

But of course, I prepared for this situation!
I crawl over to Rose on my stomach.
Ahh... Rose, help me!!!
(How's that for making use of Rose's influence!)
You're safe now, don't worry...

It would've been better if she had been pulled into
the move as well, but she just smiled like an angel.
Damn it... The President's shadow...
Get it together, she can hear you!

I think I left a bad enough impression. Bad rumors
spread faster than good ones, so this should surely
work in my favor.

The infirmary...is still under construction. Let's go
to the medical tent and get those wounds treated!

I can feel their eyes fixed on my back as Rose leads
me away.
Owwww...!!!
It's going to sting a little, but don't move.

She cleans and disinfects my wounds, then bandages
them. Her hands move with deft precision.
O-Okay...

You're bleeding, but there doesn't seem to be any
damage to your bones or muscles, thankfully...

(Well, I managed to dodge or block most of it.
And I'm only pretending that it hurts.)
Th-Thank you...

(While I'm lowering my reputation, I want to be hated,
too. I can't have Rose fawning over me like this.)

But, if you'd come to help me sooner, I wouldn't
have gotten hurt...

You are right... I'm sorry. I was trying to keep my
distance from you since the incident, but...

(I tried blaming her, but it didn't work. Looks like
she's determined to be my ally.)

(And judging by her words, us running into each
other in the hallway wasn't by chance...)

I had a feeling that if I am too close by, it causes
you trouble...but this time I'm certain of it.

Don't listen to the gossip. There's no need to pay
it any attention.

It's one of the biggest obstacles I face...
Let's overcome it, together...!
O-Okay?

(At least I managed to damage my reputation with the
others before summer break, so I guess it's fine.)
(But with Rose...I'm gonna have a hard time!)
